      void tryMove(MasterSquirrel masterBot, XY moveDirection)
      Tries to move the MasterSquirrel tryMoveSquirrel: Calls the Method for all Entities that are same to the MiniSquirrel MiniSquirrel: If the MiniSquirrel is a slave of this MasterSquirrel the Entity is killed and the Energy will be added.

      • tryMove

        public void tryMove(MiniSquirrelBot miniSquirrel,
                    XY moveDirection)
        Tries to move the MiniSquirrel tryMoveSquirrel: Calls the Method for all Entities that are same to the MasterSquirrel MasterSquirrel: If the MiniSquirrel is a slave of this MasterSquirrel the Entity is killed and the Energy will be added. Else the Entity is killed
        Specified by:
        tryMove in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        miniSquirrel - The MiniSquirrel Entity
        moveDirection - The move direction to the wanted Position as XY Object

      • tryMove

        public void tryMove(MasterSquirrel masterBot,
                    XY moveDirection)
        Tries to move the MasterSquirrel tryMoveSquirrel: Calls the Method for all Entities that are same to the MiniSquirrel MiniSquirrel: If the MiniSquirrel is a slave of this MasterSquirrel the Entity is killed and the Energy will be added. The MasterSquirrel will move to the Position Else the Entity is killed
        Specified by:
        tryMove in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        masterBot - The MasterSquirrel which is to move
        moveDirection - The move Vector as XY Object

      • tryMove

        public void tryMove(GoodBeast goodBeast,
                    XY moveDirection)
        Tries to move the GoodBeast If the wanted Position is empty the GoodBeast moves else another command is get.
        Specified by:
        tryMove in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        goodBeast - The GoodBeast which is to move
        moveDirection - The move Vector as XY Object

      • tryMove

        public void tryMove(BadBeast badBeast,
                    XY moveDirection)
        Tries to move the BadBeast At first a Temporary XY Object is created, on this Position the Entity is get. If the Entity is a MasterSquirrel the BadBeast bites the MasterSquirrel. The Energy and the Bites are updated. Else its checked if the Position is empty.
        Specified by:
        tryMove in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        badBeast - The BadBeast which is to move
        moveDirection - The move Vector as XY Object

      • getNearestPlayerEntity

        public Entity getNearestPlayerEntity(XY pos)
        Get the nearest Player to a specific Position. The sear Radius is a 7x7 field. For a easier Code the Center is set to the Top Right Corner If after that a Position is out of Range it's set to 0 After that the whole Area is checked if a Maser or Mini Squirrel is in the field The first one found and the next is found, it will check the moves to each of them. If entity1 needs less moves than entity2, entity2 is overridden with entity1. Else its done otherwise
        Specified by:
        getNearestPlayerEntity in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        pos - The Position where all Entities are searched as XY Object
        Returns:
        The Entity of the nearest Player, if no Player found null
